skills.Name: Dance of Fire
skills.Description: A provocative and energetic dance, your energy boosts your allies fighting abilities. They fight faster, stronger, better. Increases the Physical Damage, Magical Damage, Atk. Speed, and Casting Speed by 5% for 5 minutes.

skills.Name: Performer's Cut
skills.Description: Slashes the target swiftly, dealing 450 Physical damage. Reduces P. Def and M. Def by 3% and evasion by 3 for 20 seconds. Requires a sword, blunt, or duals.

skills.Name: Performer's Blade Assault
skills.Description: Unleashes a powerful combo onto the target, dealing 650 damage and reduces the targets P. Atk and M. Atk by 4% for 20 seconds. Requires a sword, blunt, or duals.

skills.Name: Final Call
skills.Description: The play is over, as you close the curtains on the audience. Deals 740 Physical Damage.

skills.Name: Sting
skills.Description: Stabs the target in the gut, dealing 200 P. Atk and decreasing the enemy's movement speed by 40% for 8 seconds, inflicts bleed, and does damage of 47HP every second. Requires a sword, dagger, duals, or dual-dagger. Over-hit is possible.

skills.Name: Crippling Attack
skills.Description: Sweep the field in front of you and tear down your enemies defenses. Deal 460 Physical Damage and reduce the targets P. Def. and M. Def. by 3% and Evasion by 3 for 10 seconds.

skills.Name: Hurricane Rush
skills.Description: Shoulder charge the target to Stun them for 3 seconds and dealing 80 Physical Damage.

skills.Name: Life Leech
skills.Description: Conjure dark fangs to sink into your targets body, dealing 72 Magical Damage and healing for 480.

skills.Name: Dual Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 27.1 when using a dualsword.

skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Focus Mind
skills.Description: Increases MP Recovery Bonus by 3.1.
